arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Lead' adds the 'originatingLeadId' attribute below to the 'Account' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: originatingLeadId

constantValues: Shows the lead that the account was created from if the account was created by converting a lead in Microsoft Dynamics 365. This is used to relate the account to data on the originating lead for use in reporting and analytics.

value.description: Shows the lead that the account was created from if the account was created by converting a lead in Microsoft Dynamics 365. This is used to relate the account to data on the originating lead for use in reporting and analytics.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'FacilityEquipment' adds the 'preferredEquipmentId' attribute below to the 'Account' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: preferredEquipmentId

constantValues: Choose the account's preferred service facility or equipment to make sure services are scheduled correctly for the customer.

value.description: Choose the account's preferred service facility or equipment to make sure services are scheduled correctly for the customer.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Service' adds the 'preferredServiceId' attribute below to the 'Account' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: preferredServiceId

constantValues: Choose the account's preferred service for reference when you schedule service activities.

value.description: Choose the account's preferred service for reference when you schedule service activities.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Territory' adds the 'territoryId' attribute below to the 'Account' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

value.name: territoryId

constantValues: Choose the sales region or territory for the account to make sure the account is assigned to the correct representative and for use in segmentation and analysis.

value.description: Choose the sales region or territory for the account to make sure the account is assigned to the correct representative and for use in segmentation and analysis.

members.name: openDeals

constantValues: Number of open opportunities against an account and its child accounts.

members.description: Number of open opportunities against an account and its child accounts.

members.name: openDealsDate

constantValues: Last Updated time of rollup field Open Deals.

members.description: Last Updated time of rollup field Open Deals.

members.name: openDealsState

constantValues: State of rollup field Open Deals.

members.description: State of rollup field Open Deals.

members.name: openRevenue

constantValues: Sum of open revenue against an account and its child accounts.

members.description: Sum of open revenue against an account and its child accounts.

members.name: openRevenueBase

constantValues: Value of the Open Revenue in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Open Revenue in base currency.

members.name: openRevenueDate

constantValues: Last Updated time of rollup field Open Revenue.

members.description: Last Updated time of rollup field Open Revenue.

members.name: openRevenueState

constantValues: State of rollup field Open Revenue.

members.description: State of rollup field Open Revenue.
